title: A Room of One's Own
author: Virginia Woolf
description: An extended essay by Virginia Woolf

title: Gender Trouble
author: Judith Butler
description: A book that introduced the concept of gender performativity

title: The Second Sex
author: Simone de Beauvoir
description: A foundational text in feminist philosophy

title: We Should All Be Feminists
author: Chimamanda Ngozi Adichie
description: An adaptation of the TEDx talk of the same name

title: Bad Feminist
author: Roxane Gay
description: A collection of essays on feminism and social critique

title: Feminism is for Everybody
author: bell hooks
description: A book that discusses the importance of feminism for everyone

title: How to Be a Woman
author: Caitlin Moran
description: A humorous book that discusses feminist issues

title: Men Explain Things to Me
author: Rebecca Solnit
description: A collection of essays that sparked the term 'mansplaining'

title: Sister Outsider
author: Audre Lorde
description: A collection of essays and speeches by Audre Lorde
